How can I use Latex to create a two-column document? Here is an example text:
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This sentence is in column one. This is some additional text to fill up space. This sentence is also in column one. Now we switch to column two. This sentence is in column two. Here is some more filler text. This sentence is also in column two.
What Latex code can I use to split this text into two columns that make sense? Please include the necessary packages and code.
